analysis.description:
Lottesy1eth.payOut (/unique_chucks/28/0x88af078337afde014574dbc6027a1db75d629b76.sol) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- theWinner.transfer(1000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/28/0x88af078337afde014574dbc6027a1db75d629b76.sol)

Lottesy1eth.drawingNo (/unique_chucks/28/0x88af078337afde014574dbc6027a1db75d629b76.sol#1023) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- stringToUint (/unique_chucks/28/0x88af078337afde014574dbc6027a1db75d629b76.sol#1062-1065)
usingOraclize.getCodeSize (/unique_chucks/28/0x88af078337afde014574dbc6027a1db75d629b76.sol#518-521) is declared view but contains assembly code

Lottesy1eth.stringToUint (/unique_chucks/28/0x88af078337afde014574dbc6027a1db75d629b76.sol#1062-1065) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- Lottesy1eth.theWinnernumber
	- Lottesy1eth.previousDrawingClosed
	- Lottesy1eth.theWinner
	- Lottesy1eth.winners
	- Lottesy1eth.chanceNo
	- Lottesy1eth.drWinChances
	- Lottesy1eth.winningChance

Reentrancy in usingOraclize.oraclize_newRandomDSQuery (/unique_chucks/28/0x88af078337afde014574dbc6027a1db75d629b76.sol#751-776):
	External calls:
	- sessionKeyHash_bytes32 = oraclize_randomDS_getSessionPubKeyHash() (/unique_chucks/28/0x88af078337afde014574dbc6027a1db75d629b76.sol#758-761)
	- queryId = oraclize_query(_delay,random,args,_customGasLimit) (/unique_chucks/28/0x88af078337afde014574dbc6027a1db75d629b76.sol#772-773)
	External calls sending eth:
	- queryId = oraclize_query(_delay,random,args,_customGasLimit) (/unique_chucks/28/0x88af078337afde014574dbc6027a1db75d629b76.sol#772-773)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- oraclize_network_name (/unique_chucks/28/0x88af078337afde014574dbc6027a1db75d629b76.sol#772-773)
	- oraclize_randomDS_args (/unique_chucks/28/0x88af078337afde014574dbc6027a1db75d629b76.sol#774-776)

Lottesy1eth.LottesyAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0x88af078337afde014574dbc6027a1db75d629b76.sol#1021-1022)
Lottesy1eth.drawingNo should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0x88af078337afde014574dbc6027a1db75d629b76.sol#1023)
OraclizeI.cbAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0x88af078337afde014574dbc6027a1db75d629b76.sol#10-11)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/28/0x88af078337afde014574dbc6027a1db75d629b76.sol#753:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
